description:
Kelly Clarkson and Brandon Blackstock married on Sunday just outside Nashville, Tennessee.凯莉·克拉克森和布兰登周日在田纳西州的那什维尔举行了婚礼。
She glowed in a stunning floor-length lace dress in three photos the star tweeted on Monday.周一他们在推特上发布了结婚照片，凯莉穿着垂到地板的蕾丝裙。
'I'm officially Mrs. Blackstock :) We got married yesterday at Blackberry Farms in TN, the most beautiful place ever!' the country singer wrote.这位乡村歌手在推特上写到“我正式成为布莱克斯托克夫人了，我们昨天在田纳西的黑莓庄园举行了婚礼，这是我见过最漂亮的地方了。”

The couple has been engaged since December 2012 and in August canceled an October 20 wedding date, saying that they would instead elope.这对儿情侣在2012年12月订婚，然后在八月取消了将于10月20日举行的婚礼，并说他们也许会私奔。
That they went through with that original date is a bit of a surprise, though they did let on something was going to happen when last week they obtained a wedding license.然后他们又觉得按原来的日期举行婚礼也是个惊喜。于是在上周，他们拿到了结婚证。

title: 美国偶像冠军凯莉•克拉克森大婚
